titleStmt.title: A character of His most Sacred Majesty King Charles the IId. With a short apologie before it, an introduction to it, and a conclusion after it. / Written by a minister of the Word, who hath for a long time desired, and daily prayed for the happy settlement of Church and state within the three nations of England, Scotland and Ireland in truth, & peace, & order.
titleStmt.author: Terry, Edward, 1590-1660.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "May 1659"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
